Deepika Padukone Miraculously Transforms Into Acid Attack Survivor For 'Chhapaak'
Deepika Padukone Miraculously Transforms Into Acid Attack Survivor For 'Chhapaak'
The way actors transform to get into the skin of their characters is applause-worthy. Joining the bandwagon of drastic transformation is Actor Deepika Padukone.
DP took to social media to shared her first look from her upcoming film, Chhapaak.
Using a full prosthetic makeup, Deepika looks both compelling and convincing as Malti.
For the uninitiated, DP plays the role of an acid attack survivor Laxmi Agarwal in the film. Helmed by Meghna Gulzar, Deepika has left for Delhi today to begin shooting.
The film will hit the theatres on January 10, 2020.
